note:
I used to host Science On Top, a science news podcast. But then 2020 happened, and after 9 years it has podfaded.

I'm a skeptic, a geek, and a sci-fi buff. I'm both intrigued and frustrated by politics & journalism.

But mostly I just toot random things that come to mind, or silly jokes, or memes. You're not always going to get intellectual profundity, but hey anything's possible.

He/him. Bi. Wurundjeri land.
